_header: If thou art young then marry not a kit
_description: Against Matrimony: an extract from The Proverbs of Hendyng (2800) — two couplets at the end of a Prymer.

BLHar3835.Transcription:
If thow art young then mary not ekitif thou art old thou hast more
                    witefor young mens wifes [may n]ot be taughtand olde mens wifes be
                    good for naught
